mods.abstract: Black and white full-length studio portrait of Johnny Wright standing and leaning against a pedestal. The photo was released by MCA Records and Moeller Talent, Inc. To view a poster that features the metal photoplate made from this photo, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40425.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
